banner.text: There’s already quite a lot of code. You can zoom out from the blocks by clicking on the minus (–) button.
All the code for this section is going to go in its own event.
Drag this block
Drop the event block anywhere on your code space
We’ve added a 'dot' object to your app. It's a 1 x 1 rectangle. The code for it is in here.
Set the co-ordinates of the dot with code. Grab a 'set x' block.
Connect it to your event.
The random number block is in the Math tray. Find it.
Grab the random number block.
Connect the blocks to set the x position of the dot to a random number.
Change from 10 to 16
Now for the y position.
Now for the y position.
Connect it below the x position code.
Set the y position with a random number too.
Set the y position with a random number too.
Set the y position with a random number too.
Change 10 to 8
Every time the app runs, the dot will be set to a random point on the pixel kit!
Great work. Next you’ll code it so that the hero can eat the dot.
